Articles.Content:
I scaled up some Ion engines and xenon tanks. They are just the default ones that have a higher thrust/weight/ect. There is no real good way to power them as one of them is the equivalent of putting 50 generic ion drives on at once, but feel free to play with them as they can significantly reduce a part count.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ion_upgrade_0235/

Edited May 20, 2014 by profit
This isn't a plugin. Change the thread title to [Part], as it is quite misleading, currently.
A bunch of other people used plugin for groups of parts, but ok.

A bunch of other people used plugin for groups of parts, but ok.

Usually that is for mods which contain both parts and a plugin to power them, like Kethane. The plugin is a set of compiled code which alters, supplements, or overrides stock game functionality in order to apply its own. Unless you know C# coding, then this doesn't count as a plugin mod.
